page.title: 09Boys clothes in Dinas (1985)
page.content: Mike,5,is wearing a rugby{shirt.} It is blue,white and navy.His shirt has got buttons from the chest upwards.It is made of{cotton.}He has got black{shorts}on.His{shorts}have got slits going up the sides.He is wearing white{socks}with green and blue stripes at the top.He is wearing grey Dunlop{trainers.}They have got stripes on. David,8,is wearing a{sweatshirt with a picture of a BMX bike on it.His {sweatshirt}is grey.He is wearing a light brown pair of{shorts. }They are quite long and look like jungle {shorts.}The have got pockets on each side and a zip.He is wearing a pair of bluey grey{socks.}His{shoes}are the same colour as his{shorts.}They have got a decorative lightning streak going across the side.
